reviews.title: Perfect fit and price! Don't think twice!!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and noticeably smoother. After just a few uses, I could see a difference‚Äîmy fine lines look less visible, and my skin feels plumper and more youthful. It absorbs quickly without feeling greasy and works perfectly under makeup. Definitely my new daily favorite!

reviews.title: GREAT moisturizer
reviews.review_text: I've used this moisturizer for years and it works very well. Love everything about it. Wish it came in larger container but would recommend it to anyone!!

reviews.title: Best exceptional facial collagen cream
reviews.review_text: Extremely absorbent and non greasy light facial collagen cream. Softens skin with highly noticeable toned appearance. Devoted to this exceptional product for years ! Thank you L'Oreal for the affordable price too!

reviews.title: Exceptionally nice texture
reviews.review_text: What I love about this stuff, which I've only used for a few weeks, is its texture. It is both light, and creamy, AND thick and substantial. That's unusual combo in my experience, at least in its price range. It works night and day, under other product or not. My 70-something skin appears to really like it. If it were even less expensive I'd be a complete convert, but I'm pretty poor so I'm trying to ... resist? lol
I'm writing a view on something I've never received. If I ordered this, could you please check and see why if I was charged for it.? Thank you.
everything is so expensive now I wish for once these companies would think about the consumers and lower the prices on things getting crazy

reviews.title: Better for night wear
reviews.review_text: Looks a bit greasy when on. So wearing at night then washing off in morning before applying makeup is best Using for 7 days and can see minimal results so far But it's doing something. Can feel it when it's on. Nice texture. Not sticky like some face creams

reviews.title: New formula is not improved
reviews.review_text: I have always liked this product. I was excited to get a new jar. I was nervous about the new formula. I am not a fan. It is a bit greasy. It is supposed to be fragrance free, but it has a bad smell. The old formula was richer and felt better. The old formula had a nice smell. New definitely does not mean improved. I read several other comments and reviews. I see that I am not the only one who was left disappointed.

reviews.title: Not for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this on social media and it looked like it was amazing and for the price, how could you pass up this "amazing" and affordable jar? I have oily skin so I know sometimes creams don't work for me, this one definitely doesn't. It seems to absorb in but not fully and what doesn't absorb in, sits on the skin no matter how I try to massage it in. It does make some liquid makeup go on smoother but after about 30 min, my whole face is shiny and greasy looking. This would be perfect for people with dry skin, not so much for oily skin. Resorting to using this as a hand and neck treat.

I have used L'Oreal collagen for over 10 years. The old formula was amazing!! I'm not sure why they decided to change something that worked fabulously, but for whatever reason, they did. The new formula burns my face and feels like when I've used too much retinol, which is what I'm suspecting they may have put in the new formula. Whatever they are using is very harsh. I will be returning for a refund and will not continue to purchase in the future.
Leaving my face feeling soft and healthy, this cream is such a rich treat for my skin. I'm so glad that I have tried it. I will definitely keep this one. Please don't ever stop selling this.

reviews.title: New Formula is Terrible
reviews.review_text: Not a fan of whatever the new formula is. Please change it back. I have been using it for a couple of years and it worked perfectly, the new formula in regular or fragrance free irritates my face, feels like it's burning.

reviews.title: New formula eye and skin irritatant
reviews.review_text: Used previous formula for years. It appeared to keep wrinkles away and skin clear. Unfortunately, the new formula contains something that irritates my skin an eyes. Why mess with a product that had such a huge following unless the new formula is less expensive to produce? It's so very sad.

reviews.title: Nothing like the old formula!
reviews.review_text: The new formula is horrible! Please go back to the previous formula!!!! I have used the previous formula for years... It was my favorite moisturizer. I'm so sad L'oreal changed the formula. Everything is off, the smell, the feel, the results... It looks like everyone else who was a loyal user also agrees!

reviews.title: L'Or√©al Collagen Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: Am impressed %26 pleased with this product. It feels heavenly. I have been using for a week with unexpected results. Best I've found in a retail store. Feels like a high end cream.

reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: This is a rich, smooth, satin like feeling cream...it helped smooth my lines around my eyes and mouth...it not only hydrates and moisturizes my face it makes my skin look younger. ‚ù§Ô∏è
didnt really do much gor me.i think Neutrogena works better for me do ill have to switch back although this brand may work for others but itjist didnt workwell for me
I have used a lot of moisturizers, but I have found out that this is an incredible moisturizer. I'm 61 years old and I have noticed the fine lines around my mouth and my eyes are disappearing.

reviews.title: Don't get it.
reviews.review_text: This new formula is not it. There's a very strong smell. It also makes my face burn and peel. I've never had this issue with the other jars I've bought.

reviews.title: Works well, great price
reviews.review_text: For the price, this works very well. It takes more product to cover my face than the more expensive ones, but not by much. Overall, I like the feel of my face after applying it. It works well under makeup, and leaves my skin soft, even the next day.

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.review_text: The new formula does not leave my skin feeling as moisturized as the old formula. The smell of the new formula is nice, but that's about all that I like. The new formula leaves a streaky residue on my skin, that doesn't go away no matter how long I rub it in. The residue also doesn't mesh well with makeup causing my makeup to separate, crack and ultimately dry out‚Äîsomething I never experienced with the old formula. The old formula left my face feeling moisturized all day long, but the new formula dries out. Overall I'm disappointed with the new formula. If you're going to purchase this face lotion I highly recommend you purchase the old formula. Old formula is 10/10, the new formula is 2/10.
I wanted this moisturizer and it was a little cheaper than a different store

reviews.title: Great Product
reviews.review_text: Loved this product - it just feels protecting on my face. Love this - use it every night.
I cannot tell about items because I have not received my merchandise my items
I love this product for my face. it does it good job. Price good price.
I love it. It's creamy and it feels so smooth on my face, good price too
I use this daily just purchased new formula hope its just as good as original
Works well, but not as well as claimed. Too pricey.
For a drugstore skincare product, I have been very happy with the quality

reviews.title: I ‚ù§Ô∏è it!
reviews.review_text: I noticed a change in the lines around my lips in days and a major change in my entire face in less than 2 weeks.
very rich smooth soft luxurious feeling cream really moisterizes deep into skinand then it tightens as it soaks in

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.review_text: This product seems to plump the wrinkles/lines making them less noticeable. It feels great on your face.
THE JAR INSIDE THE BOX WAS LABELED AS ONLY SUNSCREEN. I ORDERED THIS BASED ON THE DESCRIPTION OUTSIDE, ON THE BOX

reviews.title: I love this moisturizer.
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, it makes my skin feel so soft and the price is unbeatable. I will be reordering it for sure.

reviews.title: Low cost, big benefits
reviews.review_text: This is a quality product at a very reasonable price. Have been using it for several years and it does soften my wrinkles.
great cream for the price. My face is no longer dry and works better than another competitor.
Love it the first cream that really works and blends so easily Thank you
i like the priduct but i ordeted anti age and this item arrived but i used loreal products before and they were very great on my skin
Do not know what they have change with the new formula. What ever it is my face and broken out. And I have used this for 5 years never an issue.
I had been very sick for about 6mo and my skin had become very dehydrated this within a week I could feel the difference and it didnt brake the bank.

reviews.title: I cannot live without it
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for many years, applying it twice daily to keep my face moisturized throughout the day. Now in my 60s, I have minimal wrinkles.
One of my favorite collagen creams. I use this, with hyaluronic acid. Give it a try , you won't regret it. It Really Works wonders . Loving it ü•∞

reviews.title: Counterfeit Item
reviews.review_text: Could tell right away from the smell that I received a counterfeit product. Also did not moisturize skin at all. The original product is great and very moisturizing.
I think this product works so well, and I think better than oil of Olay. Also unlike Olay products Loreal products are more affordable for the every day women. You can't beat it.
I love all my L'Oreal products. I was not a huge fan of this moisturizer. I thought I would try it though. I believe this is for a younger generation. For them, I think it would be fine!
I couldn't find it on Amazon and I got it the next day with Walmart.
just started using it so going to it a minute so far so good

reviews.title: The price is great!
reviews.review_text: Works really good. My skin is so moisturized after one week, I can see a difference.

reviews.title: Works for me
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this cream. I wish it came in bigger size.
skin care is important and keeps you feeling better.this os a good one .Feels great.
As an elderly woman, I find this product to terrific !

reviews.title: Nice product
reviews.review_text: This cream feel nice in the face. Very moisturizing. Smells great also. Would purchase again.
I like the texture..fragrance and the moist appearance in my face.
I love this product. It is thick cream but goes on smooth and leaves skin moisturize and smooth

reviews.title: Bring back old formula!
reviews.review_text: HATE the new formula. Please bring back the old formula. I've used this moisturizer for years and am now forced to find something else because the new formula smells extremely strong and left my face burning. I'm not sensitive to smells, but wow, it's overwhelming, and the fragrance free formula smells just as bad. You guys completely missed the mark with this and lost a loyal customer.
Really like this face moisturizer because of the collagen been using for years

reviews.title: It works for me
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 3 months and I am seeing less fine lines around my eyes.
it makes my face plumper....great for the price also

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: Like the product, have reordered many times
The product reduces fine lines and is a great overall moisturizer.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: My skin does feel better after using this. Great price for a great product!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.review_text: I have used for years and will definitely continue.

reviews.title: not very hydrating
reviews.review_text: i like it but the moisture doeant last all day for me. unfortunately it only lasted 3 hours

reviews.title: the best balance of price and quality
reviews.review_text: Good for everyday use. both mornings and nights.

reviews.title: The old formula was much better.
reviews.review_text: I agree with many others here who have used this cream for many years. The previous cream was so cushiony on my skin and made it so soft. I used it about 5 minutes ago, and my face feels sticky. I don't care for the new scent either.

reviews.title: ‚ÄúNew formula‚Äù burns, replaced the best cream!!
reviews.review_text: Why is my new purchase a ‚Äúnew formula‚Äù now?? What happened to the previous lucious cream with the delightful scent? New product is more like a gel and my face burns. Ughhh I'm dissatisfied and now I have to search for a new face cream.

reviews.title: New formula is awful especially the new smell.
reviews.review_text: I used this product for 20 years and loved it until you changed the formula. The new formula is awful especially the smell. I totally agree with all of the recent reviews about the new formula. Why mess with a great product ? Not sure why corporations want to change something that is good. I hope someone in charge is reading all of these comments and listens to your loyal, long term customers. Bring back the old formula. Especially the smell. It is just awful now.

reviews.title: Whomever reformulated this should be fired
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal user of this product for 20 years! I've told everyone that I use it and recommended it to so many people. I've always said it's the reason that I still look like I'm in my 40s even though I'm almost 60. But whatever you've done to this new formula is terrible! All of the other reviews that say this are correct. The scent is disgusting ‚Äî smells like watermelon candy. And the formulation is not nearly as creamy as it used to be as others have said it now causes skin irritation where previously it sooth. I can only think that some "genius "within the organization decided to use cheaper ingredients and think we all wouldn't notice. It's really too bad that you took a product that was so excellent And had so many benefits for my skin and clearly had a huge following and you ruined it.

reviews.title: Not genuine product!
reviews.review_text: This is a fake! I've used this product for many many years. I have another one on hand for direct comparison, as if i even need it, lol. Smells different, tastes different, feels different! Dont trust it. I'll return and continue to buy from Target. Thanks for waisting my time Walmart

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I ordered it for my 86 year old mother. She loves it!

reviews.title: New formula does not work for me
reviews.review_text: The new formula has something added to it that burns the skin on my face when I try to use it.

reviews.title: Terrible please bring back the old formula
reviews.review_text: What is this new look about?I used this cream for few years , recently I bought and omg it's not the cream I know, the scent it's awful it's not moisturizing my face it's making my face and eyes to burn for two days I have a red eye , that's the meaning of that new look red, burned, itchy face???stop experimenting on our faces do on your first before you put on a shelve and charge money for this mistake that we paying with money, pain and suffering

reviews.title: Used to be a good product but no longer
reviews.review_text: This was a great product but the most recent jar purchased is different and not in a good way. First of all the scent is atrocious and overwhelming, it used to be pleasant and subtle. The consistency isn't as thick as before and is now more gel like. It is also slightly irritating and stings my face, it never used to do that. Why change a stellar product and make it worse? Now I'm on the hunt for a new daily moisturizer for a cold,dry climate.

reviews.title: Bring back the old formula!!
reviews.review_text: This new formula to the L'Or√©al Collagen Moisture Filler is trash! The scent is horrible and it simply does not feel the same. If it's not broken, why fix it? Who ever agreed to this change, needs to reevaluate this terrible decision and eradicate this whole new formula for eternity! Terrible!

reviews.title: Horrible decision L'Or√©al
reviews.review_text: Bought the ‚Äúnew formula‚Äù it caused so much irritation ( red rash, welts and massive burning) after just one application. From reading other reviews it's a pretty common complaint. The scent and texture is awful too. Why would they change a product that was perfect for so many loyal customers? If the change was to save money or should I say make more money why not just raise the price of the original? I'm sure your loyal customers would much rather spend a little more versus having to find a new product and losing a lot of business.

reviews.title: Bring back old formula
reviews.review_text: This new formula is awful. It's sticky, thick and the smell is horrible even in the unscented variety. I was a faithful user of the old cream and now have to go on a hunt for a new collagen cream.

reviews.title: Love at first apply
reviews.review_text: Just got this today and am already impressed. I know it will take more time to see anti-aging effects but the feeling of the product is fantastic! Light, not greasy. I'm sensitive to thick, heavy products. This I can't feel, but if I touch my face it still feels moisturized hours later. Some folks say the scent is too strong but I really don't think so, it's nice and doesn't linger, excited to see how it helps with wrinkles that are starting to appear around my eyes.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Have only used this product about 5 times. After the last 2 applications I noticed I was getting a rash from it. Guess it will go in my trash can. I am not typically sensitive to facial creams.

reviews.title: Smooth soft skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Collagen Moisture filler is awesome for smooth, soft skin. I love that it makes my makeup go on smoother and with less caking in the fine lines. I've been using this for a few weeks now and have noticed the fine lines around my eyes are starting to look better. **I received this product for free as a promotional offer in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.title: Collagen and Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product is AMAZING! I use it every night. A little goes a long way. After a few days using this I have noticed the fine lines on my forehead show less and round my eyes. This is a must have your your nightly skin care routine

reviews.title: New formula burns
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cream for years and it was amazing. Recently I bought the ‚Äúnew formula‚Äù and it burned my skin and left a welt under my eyes. I now have a brown spot where the welt was. I'm not happy and finding a new face cream after so many years is going to be a pain also. You should bring the old cream formula back!

reviews.title: Change back the formula!!!
reviews.review_text: This used to be the best moisturizer I've ever had. Better than any high end stuff. But the new formula is horrible! The smell, the texture and it's not even hydrating anymore! It is cheap feeling. I could go on. L'Or√©al please change the formula back to what it was!

reviews.title: New formula is terrible - used to be perfection
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal fan of this product for years, but yesterday I purchased a new jar and the smell is overwhelmingly awful and it feels different too. The previously formula was perfect - smelled divine, felt luxurious and worked beautifully‚Ä¶.why did it change? I will be disposing of the full jar‚Ä¶so disappointed!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream smells so good and is so hydrating I use it over my super heavy duty retinoid and don't have a problem with dryness/flakiness the next day. No opinions on whether it helps wrinkles, but my skin looks and feels great.

reviews.title: ASTONISHING results
reviews.review_text: I'm a sixty three year old male. I look pretty good for my age due to a nutrient dense diet, prioritizing sleep and regular, light exercise. I was EXTREMELY impressed with the results the first time I used it. My skin has an overall improved appearance. It absolutely seems healthier, younger and just fresher!!! Mature skin can really look dreadful and old on overcast days. This superb cream really is a "secret weapon" for those conditions... I also shared this cream with a male relative in his seventies who is an executive and still working who was thrilled with the results! This dense cream fully absorbed quickly and does not produce shininess.

reviews.title: Creamy Collagen, YES!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a little over two years and I LOVE IT! It goes on smooth and has a nice fragrance to it, Mostly though it does what it says it does. It provides a ton of moisture that does not leave a greasy or flaky residue. It hydrates well and it helps fill in dry, dull looking areas on the face. It works great alone because I've noticed if applied with other products like SPF lotions or serums or a skin protectant, it tends to make cracks in the moisture barrier. However, applying makeup foundation over it seems to work pretty good. Overall, a really good product. The smell is really nice too. Very soft and subtle.

reviews.title: Great first impression but then allergic?
reviews.review_text: The first couple of times I used this I loved it...I used it only at night and my skin felt hydrated, smooth and bouncy the next day. But then I woke up with my eyelids so swollen they were almost shut, and the rest of my skin was red and blotchy. I'm not sure what happened but clearly my skin doesn't love it. Too bad because it seemed like a great product. I tried it again last night after waiting a week just to make sure it wasn't something I ate, or something else I used...same results.

reviews.title: It works
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I tried L'Oreal the collagen moisture filler. The cream is a light texture and goes on well. I didn't see much difference in my creases on my face. The only thing I didn't like is it made my T zone oily after a couple of hours.

reviews.title: New formula doesn't work
reviews.review_text: I have to agree with the recent reviews. The new formula is below par. My skin is dried out within a couple hours instead of lasting all day like it used to. Plus I now smell like watermelon candy. The previous fragrance was pleasant. It appears the reviews were overwhelmingly positive before you decided to ‚Äúfix‚Äù this. I hope you will return to the old formula. This will be the last jar I purchase :(

reviews.title: So far, I like it
reviews.review_text: I've only used this product for a few days, and so far, I like this product. It wears well, and it does not feel greasy. My face feels replenished, soft, and vibrant as I monitor its ability to visibly smooth my fine wrinkles. I recommend this L'Oreal Collagen Moisture Filler daily moisturizer!

reviews.title: New Formula is terrible
reviews.review_text: New formula is terrible and the scent is overwhelming. Please bring back the old formula with the original scent.

reviews.title: great face moisturizer
reviews.review_text: its only been a week since ive been using it as a face moisturizer and i love how it keeps my face feeling soft and moisturized even after i put my make up on.

reviews.title: Results are very notable
reviews.review_text: I use this every night it's not heavy weighing down my skin with oils and it doesn't leave my pillows greasy my skin especially under my chin looks visibly tighter

reviews.title: Leaves your face feeling renewed.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] After one use of this product I definitely could feel a big difference in my skin texture and appearance! I highly recommend this product if you deal with dryness and texture problems.

reviews.title: Don't use new formula!
reviews.review_text: New formula is terrible! Be careful. Purchased the fragrance free as I usually do. Broke out with horrible rash on the neck. Same day went & purchased regular product. Same result only not as bad. Have been using this product the past several years no issues no problems, till now.

reviews.title: Refreshing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received a free sample of L'Or√©al Collagen moisture filler to try. I've been using it for the last 3 weeks on my face and neck. The first thing I noticed was the light, clean, refreshing scent. It is slightly like cucumber. The next thing I noticed was how smooth it felt as I applied it. It has a very silky feel that absorbs quickly leaving my skin feeling smooth and hydrated. My skin has not had any breakouts or any other irritations. It even seems to have begun smoothing out the skin on my neck in the areas I have some sun damage. I will definitely continue to use this product to see if my skin continues to improve.

reviews.title: Excellent results in a few days
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This cream is incredible, my skin looks soft and hydrated, and the best thing is that in just a few days I have noticed a big difference in my skin, I finally have a perfect skin tone, I will definitely continue using it daily and I will recommend it to my friends and family.

reviews.title: Love this product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been using this moisturizer for a couple of weeks now. My skin feels smoother, hydrated without the grease and looks better too! It looks thick and creamy, however, once you put it on, it doesn't feel that way on your skin. I would definitely recommend this moisturizer! I have combination skin and it works well for me!

reviews.title: Real skin fact!
reviews.review_text: Great experience, product is very accessible and the result is evident in 2 weeks for my case. I have been used many top brands from another suppliers with very high cost and this Collagen from Loreal was super effective considering the cost and availability!

reviews.title: I really like this product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a little on the thinker side so I used it at night only, I have very oily skin. I woke up with my skin feeling soft and smoother. I had a few breakouts when I used during the day. I will continue to use this as a nighttime moisturizer.

reviews.title: Miracle in a jar
reviews.review_text: After using Oil of Olay for two years and still looking old and tired, I tried your Collagen cream and WOW what a difference! Coworkers can't believe I am 61 - they say I look like I am in my 40‚Äùs. Thank you for this amazing product and you have a customer for life!!!

reviews.title: wonderful smooth skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this product morning and night after cleansing and using a toner. It went on so thick yet filling for my wrinkles and the collagen is very youthful. I can see the difference after a few weeks.

reviews.title: New is not always better
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for a long time. They recently changed the formula as it says on the box. I do not like the new formula at all. My face used to feel moisturized all day. The new formula does not make my face feel moisturized at all. I wish they would bring back the old formula.

reviews.title: I would not buy this product again.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product may be good for others but it is not for me. I used it every morning and every night. Yes..it did make my face look more plump and put together BUT‚Ä¶it also made my face super oily and that is something I do not want. Other than that the product worked ok. I received this product for free in exchange for my review.

reviews.title: Please bring back the old formula!
reviews.review_text: Please bring the old formula back. New one makes mu allergies crazy and doesn't moisturize at all. It also made my face itchy.

reviews.title: Would buy again
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Smoothe and firming lotion, best of all, has spf! Skin feels soft all day and not dry. Would buy again!

reviews.title: I like this but I don't love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I enjoyed using this moisturizer - the scent is pleasant and it is moisturizing. I can't say it raw any better than my other products but the price is much better.

reviews.title: New formula has ruined it
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years because I grew up with my mom using it. The new formula is not good and the scent is not good. I'm so so dissapointed.
I use this moisturizer day and night. Love that WalMart has it at a great price

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for years and loved it and the scent. I absolutely can't stand the new product. The smell is horrible, and the product doesn't moisturize like the original did. I lucked out and found an original on the shelf of my local store, but I don't know what I'll switch to when that's gone. Please consider bringing back the original.

reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this for about a month and I am absolutely loving what it's done for my skin. I love how it feels super hydrating but doesn't leave your face feeling like it has a bunch of product on it. I love using it before putting on my make up because I feel like it makes a great canvas for my foundation and make up. I don't use a primer or a setting spray and my makeup lasts all day. I have noticed some of the lines on my forehead are smaller. So thats a plus as well! Definitely recommend if you're looking for a great product that doesn't break the bank!

reviews.title: I definitely would buy this product again
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used the product every morning and evening for the first time and to be honest I'm happy with the results I see the difference in my sink and the only thing I just dislike about it is that my face gets oily

reviews.title: Definitely going to be buying again!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] ‚Å¶I have just starting using this moisturizer and my skin has never felt better! ‚Å©It is the perfect texture and doesn't have my skin feeling greasy‚Å¶. I will definitely continue to purchase this product!‚Å©

reviews.title: Plump and hydrated!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use this product after washing and using a toner. It has a light scent that I like, and a smooth cool consistency. I definitely notice a difference in the morning when I use it. My under eye area is more plump and hydrated and my concealer goes on smoother. I received this product in exchange for my review and will continue using it in place of my usual moisturizer! I am constantly looking for new products to help my beginning to age skin and this one is a winner!

reviews.title: I Really like this Product & would buy it again
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It's creamy and absorbs into your skin w/o a greasy feeling. My skin seems to feel softer & smoother. Just as good as the more pricey products. I've always liked Loreal. I'm very happy they made an affordable facial moisturizer that is top of the line at an affordable price. I really like the way it makes my face feel

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: Best ever, enjoy it more than E.L.F.s Helped with my acne as well

reviews.title: Love this product as a night time routine
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this product and I've been using it daily as my daily routine. It's perfect

reviews.title: Could not use
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I wasn't able to use this product as intended because of the scent bothering my allergies

reviews.title: So in love with the cream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] How i fall in love with this cream. Having try it for few days and my skin get some improvement clearly. Feel soft and smooth more. The cream is not feel greasy when i apply in. Love it

reviews.title: I will buy this product FOREVER
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Amazing! I have sensitive combination skin, so I have trouble finding products that not only help but don't irritate my skin. A lot of thick moisturizers clog my pores and light moisturizers don't moisturize enough. This is perfect though. It's thick but feels lightweight. I've used it every morning for the last two weeks and seen a noticeable difference in my skin.

reviews.title: Feels great on my skin
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] L'Oreal Paris Collagen Moisture Filler has a wonderful feel on the skin. It blended in to my skin really well leaving it feeling moisturized but not greasy. The fine lines felt fuller and less defined,not as noticable. is has a nice light fragrance.

reviews.title: So hydrating!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This non greasy cream is absolutely perfect for my dry and aging skin. It has such a nice light and refreshing texture and absorbs almost immediately into my skin. It does not clog my pores even with overnight use. My skin feels softer and plumper the next morning. I experienced no sensitivity after use.

reviews.title: Soft Beautiful Face
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I use this as a last step moisturizer after using my Garnier micellar water or Murad essential C toner, I can also use this after using my murad face wash and my tarte sea drink of H2O. My face feels so soft and refreshed after, I have been using this almost daily but morning and night on the days I do use it and I love it. It has a pleasant smell but it doesn't linger.

reviews.title: New go-to fav !!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Wow !! I was skeptical to be quite honest. I never typically think of L'Or√©al as a skin care brand, I think more makeup & hair care. I am pleasantly surprised with how well this moisturizer works. It feels luxurious and saturates so well into my skin. I feel like there's been an overall difference in my skins appearance and firmness.

reviews.title: I would absolutely buy this again to continue using it.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this on my face, neck and ears. My very dry areas. Once I started I could see an immediate difference. I use this product at night before bed so I can let it work. I love it. I am and have never really used any thing on my face but soap and water. This has changed up my routine. Thank you for giving me this opportunity to try this great product.

reviews.title: Nice Moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product has a nice smell to it, not a chemical one. I like the way it makes my face feel, I do only use it at night. I have noticed a brighter skin tone an am looking forward to seeing more results the longer I use it. I highly recommend this to anyone that has fine lines or even just wants more plump, hydrated skin.

reviews.title: Works and Smells Great!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thanks L'OR√âAL for the opportunity to try the Collagen Moisture Filler Regular Moisturizer. This is a thick and creamy moisturizer, which I think would be great for daily winter use and nighttime summer use. It smells fresh and clean and has a fairly strong scent. I noticed my skin looking bouncier and fuller after just 3 days!

reviews.title: Very good moisturizer
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I did receive this as part of a promotion. I really like this moisturizer. It has a pleasant scent, I did notice a difference in the firmness of my face. I love the price. The reason for the 4 stars is that there is no spf. I do like to use a moisturizer with SPF. Other than that, it's a great product.

reviews.title: Great product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This moisturizer is wonderful! The texture is great it's not thick or greasy and goes on smooth without any dragging or rolling skin. It absorbs quickly, fine lines are instantly smoother and skin is brighter and face looks fuller

reviews.title: Love this product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So far I have nothing negative to say about this lotion. It seems rich and thick but applies lightweight and not greasy. It may already have a slight plumping effect but I can't say for sure. I will definitely continue to use and probably purchase when I run out!

reviews.title: Very Hydrating!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the Loreal Paris Collagen Moisture Filler Daily Moisturizer in exchange for my honest review. The texture is luxurious! It's silky and smooth. It goes onto the skin beautifully. It's a great base under makeup or by itself. It gave my skin a hydrated, plump and natural glow. So far I really like this product and would recommend it!

reviews.title: Goes on like a dream!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Once I tried this moisturizer I was in love. It goes on so smooth, soaks into my skin without leaving it oily or sticky. L'OREAL's Collagen Moisture Filler Regular Moisturizer has replaced my previous moisture cream. I've noticed my skin has a glow and a bit more bounce to it after 3 weeks of use. Before using this product I noticed my skin isn't what it was in my 20s so this collagen moisturizer has been of a confidence booster as I age gracefully. I received this product in exchange for my honest review

reviews.title: Looking for a thicker moisturizer this is for you!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thanks L'OR√âAL for the free Collagen Moisture Filler Regular Moisturizer! I was excited to use this upon arrival, and loved the way it smelled! I did notice it is a little bit thicker than my normal moisturizer so if you're looking for a thicker moisturizer, this is for you. It made my face feel smoother and plumper! I had a glow to my face all day after using.

reviews.title: My skin felt plumped and hydrated
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Thank you, L'Oreal Paris for sending me this free product to review! I've been using the product for about two weeks now and I'm glad to say that I do feel a difference in my skin, particularly since I am not a big water drinker. Whenever I apply this product to my face, it feels like it automatically absorbs and makes my face feel cool and moist. To me it feels like my face is plumper and has a bit more glow to it. While, the directions for use state that it can be applied day or night, I prefer it for night use only due to its thicker, cold cream consistency. Even though it blends and absorbs well, I still find it a little too thick for day use. I would purchase this product to balance out my skin routine products because I can definitely feel the moisturizing aspect. I would also recommend this to my friends as an affordable option for moisturizing and pumping the facial derma.

reviews.title: Add It To Your Cart Now!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love doesn't even begin to describe how I feel about this collagen moisture filler from L'oreal. I have been using this lovely moisturizer for several weeks now and I am in love with how this instantly plumps, firms and hydrates my skin, it literally is filling in my fine lines and they appear instantly smoother. My skin is bouncy and firm with a youthful glow!! The collagen is helping my skin retain its natural moisture while adding hydrating qualities from L'Or√©al's Purification process, wow!! My skin is deeply hydrated and healthy looking again, all thanks to this collagen filler. I really like that L'Or√©al doesn't add any dyes or mineral oils and this moisturizer is not only paraben free but also allergy tested and safe for sensitive skin. From the moment you use this collagen filler you can feel it lock in the moisture, it absorbs quickly, isn't greasy, doesn't clog your pores and gives your skin forty eight hours of moisture. Nothing else that I have used can compare to how incredible this has my skin looking and feeling. I will definitely be purchasing this collagen filler over and over again, it is truly amazing!!

reviews.title: I love this product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have been using this product as part of my skincare routine in the morning and at night. It goes on so nicely and smells amazing! The one thing I did notice is that if I put too much on, it does make my face feel a little oily. A little goes a long way!
